query:
SELECT 
  id, 
  txid, 
  customerId, 
  amount, 
  status, 
  createdAt, 
  paidAt,
  updatedAt
FROM pix_transactions 
WHERE customerId = 480001 AND amount = 120
ORDER BY createdAt DESC
